mapper.select: select post.seq, post.seq_blog, post.title, post.regtime, post_basic.content from post inner join post_basic on post.seq = post_basic.seq;

select post.seq, post.seq_blog, post.title, post.regtime, post_basic.content from post inner join post_basic on post.seq = post_basic.seq where seq_blog in ( select seq_neighbor from user_neighbor where seq_user = #{seq_user} )
select post.seq, post.seq_blog, post.title, post.regtime, post_basic.content from post inner join post_basic on post.seq = post_basic.seq where seq_blog = #{seq_blog}
select post.seq, post.seq_blog, post.title, post.regtime, post_basic.content from post inner join post_basic on post.seq = post_basic.seq where post.seq = #{seq}
